timeline.author: krusche

timeline.message: load images from server not from github

timeline.author: FrankeLukas

replies.bodyText: A third assessor, other than the original assessor will then be able to re-assess... Something is off here. Either other than the original assessors - plural, because there have to be two before a third comes, or A second assessor, ....
replies.author: FrankeLukas

replies.bodyText: Not really an issue but more a matter of taste, I'd rewrite No stable internet connection? Not an issue. All changes made by the students are saved locally and automatically synced every 30 seconds. as All changes made by the students are saved locally and automatically synced every 30 seconds to avoid issues with instable internet connections. which sounds more formal to me. You can keep it as is if you think it is better.
replies.author: FrankeLukas

timeline.bodyText: Furthermore, You can preset... => Furthermore, you can preset...
timeline.author: FrankeLukas

replies.bodyText: Add an unlimited amount of exercises from most Artemis exercise types.: I'm not sure what that is supposed to mean. "most"? Imo this would read better as Create an unlimited amount of exercises from Artemis' default exercise types. (I assume that is what was meant here.)
replies.author: FrankeLukas

timeline.bodyText: students decide between working with the integrated code editor or can clone the repository and work on the exercise on their IDE of choice => students decide between working with the integrated code editor and cloning the repository, working on the exercise on their IDE of choice
timeline.author: FrankeLukas

timeline.bodyText: Wait, I think it is better if we host this ourselves! Don't we have FA included already?
timeline.author: jpbernius

replies.bodyText:
yes, please use the local version.
It's really bad practice to link to external URLs like this
replies.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to load external fonts? What about using the same font setup as elsewhere?
timeline.author: jpbernius

replies.bodyText:
I agree, please use the same font as in all other places.
It's really bad practice to link to external URLs like this
replies.author: krusche

timeline.message:
Add features: offline mode for students, review individual exams for instructors.
Make LRZ login only visible for tum accounts.
Rework exam end screen to reduce clutter

remove imported font and icons, apply text feedback
